properties.name: jeap.governance.dataimport.cron-expression
properties.description: Cron expression to schedule the data import job

properties.name: jeap.governance.dataimport.lock-at-least
properties.description: Minimum duration for which the lock should be held during the data import job

properties.name: jeap.governance.dataimport.lock-at-most
properties.description: Maximum duration for which the lock can be held during the data import job
